```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(sf); sf_use_s2(FALSE)
library(terra)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
shape1 <- readRDS("data/PA_post.RDs")
shape2 <- readRDS("data/PA_pre.RDs")
shape12<-rbind(shape1, shape2)

m <- glm(presabs ~ effort + log(area) + env.elev + env.bio_1 + env.bio_2 +
      env.bio_3 + env.bio_4 + env.npp + env.tree, 
    family = "binomial", data = shape12)
```

```{r}
plot(shape12$X, shape12$Y)

```
